alert.note: Alert for Bayamon; Catano; Guaynabo; San Juan (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued February 06 at 12:11AM AST until February 06 at 2:15AM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has extended the * Flash Flood Warning for... San Juan Municipality in Puerto Rico... Guaynabo Municipality in Puerto Rico... Bayamon Municipality in Puerto Rico... Catano Municipality in Puerto Rico... * Until 215 AM AST. * At 1207 AM AST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other drainage and low lying areas. Emergency managers reported flood waters continue on the roadways. Additional rainfall will aggravate the situation. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... San Juan, Guaynabo, Catano, Bayamon, Sabana Seca and Carolina. Additional rainfall amounts of up to 1 inch or more are possible in the warned area. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED EXPECTED RAINFALL...1-2 INCHES IN 1 HOUR
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
